nodes.title: Easy Garlic Bread
nodes.excerpt: This bread is so simple to make and so delicious, that we do not buy bread at the store any longer! To make it you would need only few simple ingredients and some time to allow it to rise. We use it for savory toasts, sandwiches and as a compliment to main meals. Enjoy! Ingredients: […]
